name: RiverRidgeMall
0:
”Alexa, ask River Ridge Mall what restaurants they have”
”Alexa, ask River Ridge Mall what time do they open”
”Alexa, ask River Ridge Mall if there are any jobs available”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: river ridge mall
Developer Terms of Use
des:
River Ridge Mall’s skill will let you know all the important information and happenings at the center. Whether you’re curious what type of stores they have, where to get a rideshare, when they will be closing, or what the next upcoming event is, download this skill to be informed on all things at River Ridge Mall. You can access this skill on any of your Alexa devices.

To get started, enable River Ridge Mall’s skill through the Alexa App or by saying, “Alexa, open River Ridge Mall.”

If you’re having trouble, please visit www.shopriverridgemall.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
